full_summary:
===============

**Bedford Institute of Oceanography Ellis Building Envelope Restoration**

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4435816206
* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-06
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-10 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the Ellis Building Envelope Restoration project at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography.

The objective of the project is to restore the building envelope of the Ellis Building to ensure the integrity and safety of the building.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Selection Criteria

*   Price

### Tender Documents

*   The tender documents can be accessed through the Government of Canada's Tendering website ([https://buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca)) and the Ariba eSourcing platform ([https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18989153](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18989153)).
*   You must register with both platforms to participate.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   Kate Mintzer
*   Phone: Not available
*   Email: [katie.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note that the rewritten text is within the 400-word limit. Any additional information is removed to adhere strictly to the word count. 
Also, be sure to format your output in nice markdown format. 

Let me know if you need any final adjustments! 

Cheers! 

RoR codes prompt
